news_title: BitsLab Uncovers Vulnerability in Chrome Extension Wallets
news_subtitle: BitsLab finds vulnerability in top Chrome extension wallets leading to potential private key theft. Read original article on coincu.com

news_title: Ripple Expands RLUSD Stability to Ethereum L2 Networks

news_title: Tether Invests $8M In Speed To Push USDT Into Everyday Payments

news_title: Ethereum Treasury BitMine Adds $140M in ETH During Market Downturn
news_subtitle: Ethereum News BitMine acquired $140.58 million worth of Ethereum (ETH) on Tuesday, buying 48,049 tokens from a FalconX hot wallet, according to on-chain analysts EmberCN and Lookonchain citing Arkham data. The Ethereum treasury firm led by Fundstrat co-founder Tom Lee has not off...
